      • updateSummary

        public void updateSummary(String field,
                          int count)
        depending on the time the application is started and ends, a query is executed to update flagged transactions using mongo operations if the transaction exists, update the date created with the new time if not insert a transaction details and date created Method to update details of a transaction with respect to time
        Parameters:
        field - given to update the summary of specific transaction
        count - given to represent the count of a specific type of transaction
